blogPost.excerpt: Our 1-click video call platform enables the end customer to call the business with zero friction. Visual engagement creates trust, facilitates the transaction, accelerates sales, improves satisfaction. Make real-time video an integral part of your solutions.
blogPost.body: Our 1-click video call platform enables the end customer to call the business with zero friction. Visual engagement creates trust, facilitates the transaction, accelerates sales, improves satisfaction. Make real-time video an integral part of your solutions.
blogPost.title: 11Sight - 1-click video calls for customers on your product or website
blogPost.author: Dr. Aleks Gollu

localize.description: 我们的一键视频通话平台可以让终端客户零摩擦地给企业打电话。视觉参与创造信任，促进交易，加速销售，提高满意度。让实时视频成为您的解决方案中不可或缺的一部分。
localize.tagline: 在您的产品或网站上为客户进行一键视频通话

localize.description: 我們的一鍵視頻通話平臺可以讓終端客戶零摩擦地給企業打電話。視覺參與創造信任，促進交易，加速銷售，提高滿意度。讓實時視頻成爲您的解決方案中不可或缺的一部分。
localize.tagline: 在您的產品或網站上爲客戶進行一鍵視頻通話

next.excerpt: Superpowered is a calendar app in your menu bar. See your daily schedule and join meetings without having to go to your calendar. Download and get started in less than 1 minute!
next.title: Superpowered - Power through the day without your calendar

localize.description: Superpowered是你菜单栏中的一个日历应用。查看您的每日日程安排和加入会议，而无需进入您的日历。下载并在不到1分钟的时间内开始使用!
localize.tagline: 在没有日历的情况下完成一天的工作

localize.description: Superpowered是你菜單欄中的一個日曆應用。查看您的每日日程安排和加入會議，而無需進入您的日曆。下載並在不到1分鐘的時間內開始使用!
localize.tagline: 在沒有日曆的情況下完成一天的工作
